author: Mukhriddin Khodieff
name: OPEN BLOG
description: Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience. The main stack is Frontend (JavaScript and Vue JS, React Js, Angular Js). My backend experience is NodeJs (Express.js) and PHP (in Laravel). I have worked on CRMs with more than one million users, completed more than 100 projects during my career. I strive for innovation and constantly try to work on myself.
